<a></a>About

<img src="pics/vera_headshot.png" alt="Vera Headshot" style="float: left; margin-right: 15px; width: 150px; height: auto;">
Vera has over 20 years experience in pharmacovigilance and drug safety. She has worked in large multinational companies and start-up biotech companies with “IND to NDA” experience across most therapeutic areas and modalities. Her expertise ranges from pharmacovigilance operations to signal detection. She has created systems and processes to ensure inspection readiness and regulatory compliance. Her motto is: “ensuring drug safety is not a choice but a philosophy“.

## Who We Support

- Start-up companies that require PV support to be compliant
- Your Safety/PV Department as you grow
- Clinical stage/premarketing stage companies
- Supporting with PV needs and establishing systems, processes for inspection readiness
- Established companies with marketed products: Providing ad-hoc resources and support

<!-- What We Do Section -->
<div class="card anchor-offset" id="what-we-do"> <!-- Added anchor-offset class -->

## What We Do

1. **Safety Surveillance**
2. **Operations**
    - SOPs and Inspection Readiness
    - Governance, Communication, Reporting, Review
    - Regulatory reporting of ICSR
    - Evaluating RFI/RFQ
    - Budget, onboarding, governance, KPI, QA/QC
    - ARGUS, ARSG, Medidata Rave EDC (Electronic Data Capture); Data reconciliation, MedDRA, WHODrug
    - Signal detection
    - Creation, review of Critical Safety Documents
    - Aggregate report (PSUR, DSUR, SUSAR) ICSR
    - Create governance structure to review safety signals
    - Vendor Management
    - Systems & Databases

</div>
